items.content_html: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.
items.title: zeevarblocks/bitcoin-signal-analyzer: Bitcoin Signal Analyzer ‚Äî A lightweight Next.js app that visualizes Bitcoin trends using ATH, ATL, and EMA70 on the 1W chart. Powered by CoinGecko API, it generates basic bullish/bearish signals for traders, with support for email alerts, ads, and affiliate monetization.

items.content_html: FlatHier is a lightweight Node.js library designed to create and manipulate hierarchical data stored in a flat JSON structure. It provides a set of core, data handling, and utility functions to manage hierarchical data efficiently.

items.content_html: Spring Commerce is a lightweight and flexible e-commerce web application built with Spring Boot. It features user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order processing, and admin dashboard. Designed for learning, practicing, or extending into a full-featured commercial solution.
items.title: DinhPhatPhat/Spring-Commerce: Spring Commerce is a lightweight and flexible e-commerce web application built with Spring Boot. It features user authentication, product management, shopping cart, order processing, and admin dashboard. Designed for learning, practicing, or extending into a full-featured commercial solution.
